Summary



U.S. FDA clears Vizag unit of Laurus LabsDr. Reddy’s gets three observation from U.S. FDA for Mirfield PlantMangalam Drugs gets final approval from WHO for Emtricitabine drugReliance Power promoters pledge 3 crore sharesDixon Technologies, Bharat Road Networks to list todayChambal Fertilisers, JK Paper, HPCL to raise funds
title: Stocks To Watch: Cadila, Dr. Reddy’s Labs, Laurus Labs, Reliance Power
